name: Manjyoti Parasar
description: EDGE’25 presents an exclusive 𝐒𝐩𝐞𝐚𝐤𝐞𝐫 𝐒𝐞𝐬𝐬𝐢𝐨𝐧 with 𝐌𝐚𝐧𝐣𝐲𝐨𝐭𝐢 𝐏𝐚𝐫𝐚𝐬𝐚𝐫, a renowned 𝐋𝐢𝐟𝐞 𝐂𝐨𝐚𝐜𝐡 & 𝐓𝐫𝐚𝐧𝐬𝐟𝐨𝐫𝐦𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧 𝐄𝐱𝐩𝐞𝐫𝐭 who’s helped thousands break through limitations and create extraordinary success.

name: Sakshi Jain
description: Abhivriddhi presents an exclusive 𝗣𝗲𝗿𝘀𝗼𝗻𝗮𝗹 𝗕𝗿𝗮𝗻𝗱𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗪𝗼𝗿𝗸𝘀𝗵𝗼𝗽 to help you:✅ Craft a powerful personal brand✅ Elevate your online presence✅ Stand out in a competitive world

name: Abhijeet Awsarmal
description: 🔥Featuring 𝗔𝗯𝗵𝗶𝗷𝗲𝗲𝘁 𝗔𝘄𝘀𝗮𝗿𝗺𝗮𝗹, a personal branding wizard and digital strategist who has helped countless professionals transform their online presence.

name: Dnyanesh Khot
description: To guide you Dnyanesh Khot—Senior Manager at Imarticus Learning, with experience at INTTRVU.ai, ExcelIR, and Unacademy! He’s here to break down finance in the simplest way possible.
